**Description:**Scope of responsibility taken-on for physician care of a patient as defined by a governmental licensing agency.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode8.0.0  _ActCredentialedCareCodeact credentialed care

**Description:**The type and scope of legal and/or professional responsibility taken-on by the performer of the Act for a specific subject of care as described by a credentialing agency, i.e. government or non-government agency. Failure in executing this Act may result in loss of credential to the person or organization who participates as performer of the Act. Excludes employment agreements.

**Example:**Hospital license; physician license; clinic accreditation.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode8.0.0  _ActCredentialedCareProvisionPersonCodeact credentialed care provision peron

**Description:**The type and scope of legal and/or professional responsibility taken-on by the performer of the Act for a specific subject of care as described by an agency for credentialing individuals.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode8.0.0  _ActCredentialedCareProvisionProgramCodeact credentialed care provision program

**Description:**The type and scope of legal and/or professional responsibility taken-on by the performer of the Act for a specific subject of care as described by an agency for credentialing programs within organizations.

name: R5V3ActCredentialedCareCodeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.ActCredentialedCareCode for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCredentialedCareCode|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCredentialedCareCode|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* 

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActCredentialedCareCode|2.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
